name: TextBuilder
description: The TextBuilder class is a utility class in JSMacros that provides a fluent builder pattern for creating complex text components with rich formatting, styling, hover events, and click interactions.
overview:
The TextBuilder class provides a powerful way to build text components with:
- Rich text formatting (colors, bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, obfuscated)
- Custom RGB colors and legacy color codes
- Hover events showing text, items, or entities
- Click events for running commands, opening URLs, or custom actions
- Method chaining for fluent, readable code
- Integration with Minecraft's text system

constructors.description: Creates a new empty TextBuilder instance.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Appends text to the builder, creating a new section with its own styling.

methods.name: withColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the current text section using a legacy color code (0-15).

methods.name: withColor
methods.signature: withColor(int r, int g, int b)
methods.description: Sets the color of the current text section using RGB values.

methods.name: withFormatting
methods.signature: withFormatting(boolean underline, boolean bold, boolean italic, boolean strikethrough, boolean obfuscated)
methods.description: Applies formatting styles to the current text section.

parameters.name: bold
parameters.description: Whether to make the text bold.

methods.name: withShowTextHover
methods.description: Adds a hover event that displays text when the mouse hovers over the current section.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text component to display on hover.

methods.name: withShowItemHover
methods.description: Adds a hover event that displays item information when the mouse hovers over the current section.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item stack to display on hover.

methods.name: withClickEvent
methods.description: Adds a click event to the current text section.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value associated with the action (URL, command, text to copy).

methods.name: withCustomClickEvent
methods.description: Adds a custom callback function that executes when the text is clicked.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Finalizes the builder and returns the resulting TextHelper component.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: Calculates the width of the text component being built.
